content: And since everyone is now talking about items they would have never imagined describing in our earnings call, we'll join that group and wanted to use the time today on the call to comment on the year-over-year drivers of the 3 main legacy ICU businesses, explain the Smiths Medical revenues we achieved in Q3 and how that bridges with our comments on the last call, provide a status update on the Smiths Medical 2 buckets of challenges we've been highlighting all year, go a bit deeper on the specific items that have really hurt gross margins this year because the scale is so astounding, and it answers the question of where has the profit gone this year.
